name: Greek Tragedy
description:
Greek Tragedy Can you escape?

When a campus frat begins taking "Greek Life" a bit too seriously, Freshman year becomes non-stop fear. Join Amy in her quest to uncover the bloody secrets of Delta Psi Fraternity and rescue her boyfriend in this classic-style survival horror.

Featuring...
  • Classic Survival Horror Gameplay
  • Tricky logic puzzles
  • Low-Fi Aesthetics
  • Tank Controls and Fixed Cameras
  • Adorable-N-Horrible art by Nastya Stepanova and Lourdes Del Castillo.
  • Average Playtime : 30 minutes.
